ReferenceBlocks.text: JUDE

block.text: YӘHUDANIN MӘKTUBU YӘHUDA

ReferenceBlocks.text: JUDE 1
Jude, a servant of Jesus Christ, and brother of James, to those who are called, sanctified by God the Father, and kept for Jesus Christ:

block.text: İsa Mәsihin qulu, Yaqubun qardaşı mәn Yәhudadan Ata Allahın sevdiyi, İsa Mәsih üçün qorunmuş olan çağırılanlara salam!

ReferenceBlocks.text: Mercy to you and peace and love be multiplied.

block.text: Mәrhәmәt, sülh vә mәhәbbәt sizә bol-bol verilsin!

ReferenceBlocks.text: Beloved, while I was very eager to write to you about our common salvation, I was constrained to write to you exhorting you to contend earnestly for the faith which was once for all delivered to the saints.

block.text: Sevimlilәr, ümumi xilasımızla bağlı sizә yazmağa çox sәy göstәrirdim. Bu arada müqәddәslәrә ilk vә son dәfә әmanәt edilәn iman uğrunda mübarizә aparmağa sizi hәvәslәndirmәk üçün sizә yazmağı özümә borc bildim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For there are certain men who crept in secretly, even those who were long ago written about for this condemnation: ungodly men, turning the grace of our God into indecency, and denying our only Master, God, and Lord, Jesus Christ.

block.text: Çünki Allahımızın lütfünü pozğunluq üçün bәhanәlәrә çevirәn, yeganә Pәrvәrdigarı – Rәbbimiz İsa Mәsihi inkar edәn bәzi allahsız adamlar gizlicә aranıza girdilәr. Onların mühakimәyә uğrayacaqları çoxdan yazılmışdır.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now I desire to remind you, though you already know this, that the Lord, having saved a people out of the land of Egypt, afterward destroyed those who didn’t believe.

block.text: Bütün bunları bildiyiniz halda sizә xatırlatmaq istәyirәm ki, ilk vә son dәfә xalqı Misirdәn xilas edәn Rәbb sonra iman etmәyәnlәri mәhv etdi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Angels who didn’t keep their first domain, but deserted their own dwelling place, he has kept in everlasting bonds under darkness for the judgment of the great day.

block.text: Öz başçılıqlarını saxlamayan, mәskunlaşdığı yerlәri tәrk edәn mәlәklәri dә böyük qiyamәt günü üçün әbәdi zәncirlәrlә bağlayaraq zülmәtdә saxlamışdı.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Even as Sodom and Gomorrah, and the cities around them, having, in the same way as these, given themselves over to sexual immorality and gone after strange flesh, are set forth as an example, suffering the punishment of eternal fire.

block.text: Sodom, Homorra vә әtrafdakı şәhәrlәr dә özlәrini buna bәnzәr tәrzdә cinsi әxlaqsızlığa vә qeyri-tәbii münasibәtlәrә tәslim etdilәr; sonra bu şәhәrlәr әbәdi odla yandırılma cәzasını çәkәrәk bir nümunә oldu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Yet in the same way, these also in their dreaming defile the flesh, despise authority, and slander celestial beings.

block.text: Eyni şәkildә aranıza girәn bu röyagörәnlәr dә öz cismini murdar edir, ağalığı rәdd edir, ehtişamlı varlıqlara şәr atırlar.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But Michael, the archangel, when contending with the devil and arguing about the body of Moses, dared not bring against him an abusive condemnation, but said,

block.text: Hәtta baş mәlәk Mikael dә Musanın cәsәdi barәsindә iblisin әleyhinә çıxıb ona şәr söylәyәrәk hökm vermәyә cәsarәt etmәdi, ancaq

ReferenceBlocks.text: “May the Lord rebuke you!”

block.text: <<Qoy Rәbb sәnә qadağan etsin!>> dedi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But these speak evil of whatever things they don’t know. What they understand naturally, like the creatures without reason, they are destroyed in these things.

block.text: Amma bu adamlar başa düşmәdiklәri hәr şeyә şәr atırlar. Onlar dәrrakәsiz heyvanlar kimi qeyri-iradi surәtdә nә anlayırlarsa, bunlarla mәhv olurlar.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Woe to them! For they went in the way of Cain, and ran riotously in the error of Balaam for hire, and perished in Korah’s rebellion.

block.text: Vay onların halına! Çünki onlar Qabilin yolu ilә getdilәr. Qazanca görә özlәrini Bilamın yalanına düçar etdilәr. Qorah kimi üsyan qaldırdıqları üçün hәlak oldular.

ReferenceBlocks.text: These men are hidden rocky reefs in your love feasts when they feast with you, shepherds who without fear feed themselves; clouds without water, carried along by winds. They are like autumn leaves without fruit, twice dead, plucked up by the roots.

block.text: Belә adamlar sizin mәhәbbәt süfrәlәrinizi lәkәlәyirlәr. Onlar sizinlә birlikdә yeyib-içәrәk qorxmadan özlәrini bәslәyirlәr. Bunlar külәklәrin tәrpәtdiyi susuz buludlardır. Payızda meyvә vermәdiyi üçün kökündәn qoparılmış vә iki dәfә ölmüş ağaclardır.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They are like wild waves of the sea, foaming out their own shame; wandering stars, for whom the blackness of darkness has been reserved forever.

block.text: Öz xәcalәtini köpük kimi sovuran şiddәtli dәniz dalğalarıdır. Sәyyar ulduzlardır ki, onlar üçün Allah qatı qaranlığı әbәdi saxlayır.

ReferenceBlocks.text: About these also Enoch, the seventh from Adam, prophesied, saying,

block.text: Adәmlә birlikdә yeddinci nәsil sayılan Xanok da bu adamlara aid peyğәmbәrlik edәrәk demişdir:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Behold, the Lord came with ten thousands of his holy ones,

block.text: <<Budur, Rәbb saysız-hesabsız müqәddәs mәlәklәri ilә gәldi ki,

ReferenceBlocks.text: to execute judgment on all, and to convict all the ungodly of all their works of ungodliness which they have done in an ungodly way, and of all the hard things which ungodly sinners have spoken against him.”

block.text: hamını mühakimә etsin vә Allaha qarşı gördüklәri allahsız işlәr vә allahsız günahkarların Özünә qarşı inadkarcasına dediklәri bütün sözlәr üçün mәhkum etsin>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: These are murmurers and complainers, walking after their lusts (and their mouth speaks proud things), showing respect of persons to gain advantage.

block.text: Bu adamlar deyinәrәk öz talelәrindәn gileylәnirlәr. Onlar öz ehtiraslarına uyğun hәrәkәt edirlәr. Ağızlarından lovğa sözlәr çıxır vә öz xeyirlәrinә görә yaltaqlanırlar.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But you, beloved, remember the words which have been spoken before by the apostles of our Lord Jesus Christ.

block.text: Amma siz, ey sevimlilәr, Rәbbimiz İsa Mәsihin hәvarilәrinin әvvәlcәdәn söylәdiklәri sözlәri xatırlayın.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They said to you that “In the last time there will be mockers, walking after their own ungodly lusts.”

block.text: Onlar sizә dedilәr: <<Axır zamanda öz allahsız ehtiraslarına görә hәrәkәt edәn rişxәndçilәr ortaya çıxacaq>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: These are they who cause divisions, and are sensual, not having the Spirit.

block.text: Bunlar ayrılıq salan, öz tәbiәtinә әsir olan, Ruha malik olmayan insanlardır.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But you, beloved, keep building up yourselves on your most holy faith, praying in the Holy Spirit.

block.text: Siz isә, sevimlilәr, özünüzü әn müqәddәs olan imanınızın tәmәli üzәrindә inkişaf etdirin vә Müqәddәs Ruhun idarәsi ilә dua edin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Keep yourselves in the love of God, looking for the mercy of our Lord Jesus Christ to eternal life.

block.text: Rәbbimiz İsa Mәsihin әbәdi hәyata aparan mәrhәmәtini gözlәyәrәk özünüzü Allah mәhәbbәtindә qoruyun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Be merciful to those who doubt.

block.text: Şübhә edәn adamlara qarşı mәrhәmәtli olun;

ReferenceBlocks.text: Snatch others from the fire and save them. To others show mercy mixed with fear, hating even the clothing stained by the flesh.

block.text: başqalarını oddan qaparaq xilas edin; digәrlәrinә isә mәrhәmәt edin. Amma qorxu içindә cismin lәkәlәdiyi paltardan belә, çәkinin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now to him who is able to keep them from stumbling, and to present you faultless before the presence of his glory in great joy --

block.text: Sizi büdrәmәkdәn qoruyub Öz izzәtli hüzuruna böyük sevinclә nöqsansız çıxarmağa qadir olan

ReferenceBlocks.text: to God our Savior, who alone is wise, be glory and majesty, dominion and power, both now and forever. Amen.

block.text: Xilaskarımız, yeganә Allaha Rәbbimiz İsa Mәsih vasitәsilә әzәldәn bәri, indi vә әbәdi olaraq izzәt, әzәmәt, qüdrәt vә sәlahiyyәt olsun! Amin.
